column2: "Ah, <%me>. Were you called too?"
"I got a transmission from Maria out of nowhere. \"You've got a mission, no refusing.\""
"When I asked for details she was like \"you'll know when you get there\". I wonder what's up."
"Well, if it's with you, it shouldn't be too bad. Okay, let's go investigate..."
"I'm here Huey! ...uh, where's Huey? And why are you guys here?"
"...Claris Claes."
"Ah, a message from Huey. What?"
"...Claris Claes. If you're hearing this message that means I'm not there."
"Of course, you idiot."
"I think I heard a biting tsukkomi, there but in the interest of time I'll continue speaking."
"Claris Claes, your mission is to accompany the two with you over there!"
"Eeeh!"
"Eeeh!"
"I've always thought that if you keep clinging to me, you'll have no hope of growing!"
"In any case, if I just threw you into the middle of some strangers, I'd just get pissed in the end!"
"In that case, you'll be fine with Sara and <%me>! Anything is permitted!"
"I made sure to hire a local guide, so all's good. Best of luck!"
"That local guide is..."
"Yeah? Great weather we have today huh?"
"An enemy?!"
"A foe?!"
"Waah, ho, hold on a sec! I'm not an enemy! I'm the local guide! The guide!"
"Haa... whipping out those weapons so suddenly... I thought my heart would stop."
"Why do all the girls you know turn out like this?"
"...Haha, whatever. That overbearing, sweltering brother asked me to help, so I'll bear with it."
"Okay, let's go. Over here, over here."

"...I want to leave this to you and go home, but I don't have a choice in
this, y'know."
"There's no helping it. Let's just get this over with. "
"Who (Is) To Forgive"
"Ch.2 - Who Forgives Who"
